description:
With 2 two different radius hooks, the HCW-17 locks in for a precise fit on almost all fixie lockring.

  • Sized to fit rings with an outside diameter of 41, 42, 43 or 44mm
  • Also fits single speed cassette hubs using lockrings with external notches
  • 29cm (11⅝) length offers excellent leverage
name: Park Tool HCW-17 Fixed-Gear Lockring Wrench
